q: Green had the judges and audience crying out for more as he serenaded them with the classic swing song: Summer Wind. After receiving a standing ovation, the 10 year-old crooner from Droitwich was told by Simon Cowell : That was fantastic. I think you are a little star! Piers Morgan thought Charlie "had it all"; whilst Amanda Seyfried predicted he could go on to win the show. taken from the official site: talent.itv.com Show 2( Saturday, 19 April 2008 at 20:05)-

WASHINGTON- If the memoir of Donald Rumsfeld , among the most powerful and controversial secretaries of defense, catches on with readers and critics, he could cite one of his many " Donald Rumsfeld 's Rules": The harder I work, the luckier I am. When Donald Rumsfeld began thinking about his book, "Known and Unknown," he imagined a more typical Washington release: a quick, impressionistic story based on whatever he recalled. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

Eagles quarterback was named comeback player of the year, capping off an improbable season. "I thank my coaches and my teammates," said Michael Vick , who was on hand to accept his award. They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback, and took advantage of my talents. Michael Vick received 291/2 of the 50 votes and beat out Seahawks receiver Mike Williams( 8 votes), Vikings linebacker E.J.
